statements: SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT reward_id, points_earned FROM rewards WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE transportation_mode = 'Car' AND points_earned BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY points_earned ASC;
SELECT transportation_mode, COUNT(*) AS count FROM rewards GROUP BY transportation_mode;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, transportation_mode FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_earned > 50 AND transportation_mode = 'bus' ORDER BY points_earned ASC;
SELECT MAX(points_earned) AS max_points, MIN(points_earned) AS min_points FROM rewards;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT transportation_mode FROM rewards WHERE points_earned BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY transportation_mode ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT points, transportation_mode FROM rewards;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, points FROM rewards WHERE transportation_mode = 'car' ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, points_earned FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_points > 1000;
SELECT r.user_id, r.points, t.points_earned FROM rewards r JOIN transactions t ON r.user_id = t.user_id ORDER BY t.points_earned DESC, r.points ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT user_id, reward_points FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE transportation_mode = 'car';
SELECT user_id, reward_points, transportation_type FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE transportation_mode='Car';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id=5;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, points_earned FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE points_earned > 100;
SELECT user_id, transportation_type FROM rewards JOIN users ON rewards.user_id = users.user_id WHERE transportation_type='Bike';
SELECT user_id, points, transportation_mode FROM rewards;
SELECT first_name, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, points, transportation_mode FROM rewards WHERE points > 100;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, mode_name FROM users JOIN user_transportation ON users.user_id = user_transportation.user_id JOIN transportation_modes ON user_transportation.mode_id = transportation_modes.mode_id;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, points, transportation_mode FROM rewards WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, mode_name FROM users JOIN user_transportation ON users.user_id = user_transportation.user_id JOIN transportation_modes ON user_transportation.mode_id = transportation_modes.mode_id;
SELECT user_id, points FROM rewards WHERE transportation_mode = 'Car' OR transportation_mode = 'Bus';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, points FROM users JOIN rewards ON users.user_id = rewards.user_id WHERE points BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY points ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT option_name, option_type FROM transportation_options ORDER BY option_type DESC;
SELECT user_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM users INNER JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id;
SELECT user_name, option_name, use_date FROM user_transportation WHERE use_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT option_name, option_type FROM transportation_options WHERE option_id = 3 ORDER BY option_type DESC;

SELECT user_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM users JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;

SELECT user_name, option_name, use_date FROM users JOIN user_transportation ON users.user_id = user_transportation.user_id JOIN transportation_options ON user_transportation.option_id = transportation_options.option_id WHERE user_transportation.user_id = 5 ORDER BY use_date ASC;
